Dear {{ publisher_name }},

The update request for "{{ journal_title }}" is now being reviewed by an Associate Editor.
The Associate Editor will have questions about it and will send you an email. She/he will not necessarily email you from a doaj.org email address. Unfortunately, these emails may end up in your Spam folder so please check your Spam folder regularly.

The DOAJ Team

***
This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.
